alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Madison (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 06 at 12:55AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND CARROLL COUNTIES... At 1255 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles north of Green Forest to 3 miles southeast of Rule to 4 miles east of Aurora, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations in or near the path include... Berryville... Huntsville... Green Forest... Withrow Springs State Park... Carrollton... Rudd... Kingston... Marble... Forum... Osage... Urbanette... Rule... Rockhouse... Dryfork... Cabanal... Metalton... Weathers... Connor... Coin... Alabam... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
